synopsis.text: Reiji Mukudori, a soon-to-be university freshman, dives headfirst into the world's most groundbreaking VRMMO in 2043 - Infinite Dendrogram. This game, renowned for its unparalleled realism and limitless potential, engages all five senses and boasts NPCs as lifelike as any human. Guided by his seasoned older brother, Shuu, and his in-game ally, Embryo, Reiji embarks on a thrilling journey through this virtual universe. However, he soon uncovers a stark reality: the death of his NPC comrades is permanent. As whispers of an impending war echo through the game, what trials and tribulations await Reiji in this hyper-realistic world brimming with infinite possibilities?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
